professional_identity.positioning_statement: Product leader with 8+ years building B2B SaaS platforms and AI-powered features. Known for bridging technical complexity with business value, shipping customer-obsessed products that scale.
professional_identity.domain_expertise: B2B SaaS, AI/ML products, platform infrastructure

current_position.title: Senior Product Manager
current_position.company_context: Series C analytics platform serving Fortune 500 customers

key_achievements.metric: $4.2M ARR growth from ML recommendation engine
key_achievements.context: Led development of AI-powered feature that increased customer engagement 65%
Built internal APIs and SDKs that became foundation for all new features
Implemented predictive analytics to identify at-risk accounts
Designed developer platform that eliminated 60% of repetitive engineering work

key_achievements.metric: 2.3M+ API calls per day with 99.95% uptime
key_achievements.context: Scaled platform infrastructure to support 10x customer growth

leadership_experience.leadership_philosophy: Lead through influence and data-driven decision making. Focus on customer outcomes over feature delivery.

management_examples.situation: Platform adoption was low across product teams due to poor developer experience
management_examples.action: Embedded with engineering teams to understand pain points, redesigned APIs with extensive documentation and SDKs
management_examples.result: Platform adoption increased from 30% to 90% within 6 months
